metadata.title: RHSA-2022:0133: Red Hat Virtualization Host security and bug fix update [ovirt-4.4.9] Async #2 (Important)
metadata.description:
The redhat-virtualization-host packages provide the Red Hat Virtualization Host. These packages include redhat-release-virtualization-host, ovirt-node, and rhev-hypervisor. Red Hat Virtualization Hosts (RHVH) are installed using a special build of Red Hat Enterprise Linux with only the packages required to host virtual machines. RHVH features a Cockpit user interface for monitoring the host's resources and performing administrative tasks.

Security Fix(es):

* samba: Active Directory (AD) domain user could become root on domain members (CVE-2020-25717)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2020-25717 samba: Active Directory (AD) domain user could become root on domain members

platform: Red Hat Virtualization 4 for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
redhat-virtualization-host-image-update is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
